    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Music History I &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>
    <div class="guideattr" id="guideattr">
     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">

     </span>
     <span class="guideurl">

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17077441">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17077441">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17077441">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17077441">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo): refcannon
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17077441" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17077442">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17077442">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17077442">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17077442">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           &nbsp;buttons&nbsp;from within any database, or visit
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/">
            Trexler Library website
           </a>
           and search in
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass
           </a>
           on the journal title to determine if itl is available full text through our library.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17077442" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17077443">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17077443">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17077443">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I find scholarly introductions to organology?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17077443">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            <em>
             New Grove Dictionary of Music and Musicians
            </em>
            ***RECOMMENDED***
            <br />
            (Trexler Library, level A, Reference, call #
            <strong>
             780.3 N532n
            </strong>
            )
            <br />
            Signed entries by experts. Authoritative source of information on musical instruments.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <div id="boxatt17077443" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17077444">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17077444">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17077444">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate images from Michael Praetorius' Syntagma Musicum
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17077444">
          <div id="boxatt17077444" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20129361">
              <a id="link_20129361" href="http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Syntagma_musicum" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20129361,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music History I', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20129361}); ">
               Wikimedia Commons
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               These images are in the public domain, and can be used for any purpose without concern over copyright, though as a courtesy credit should always be given to the source.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17077445">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17077445">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17077445">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I find scholarly books on my subject?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17077445">
          <div id="boxatt17077445" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20129363">
              <a id="link_20129363" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://newfirstsearch.oclc.org/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20129363,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music History I', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344495}); ">
               WorldCat
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               ***RECOMMENDED***
               <br />
               Catalog of books and documents in libraries throughout the world. Watch especially for the AREA LIBRARIES designation.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17077446">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17077446">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17077446">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate peer-reviewed journal articles?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17077446">
          <div id="boxatt17077446" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20129365">
              <a id="link_20129365" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20129365,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music History I', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12618737}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A good starting place for journals, and includes the full text of about 3000 journals. Limit to "peer reviewed" to find only scholarly articles. Back issues of journals begin as early as 1990. Recent issues may not be included yet, due to publisher agreement. Journals held in Trexler Library are marked accordingly.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20129366">
              <a id="link_20129366" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20129366,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music History I', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343016}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               ***RECOMMENDED***
               <br />
               Includes extensive full text, all from scholarly periodicals.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20129367">
              <a id="link_20129367" href="http://scholar.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20129367,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music History I', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19855349}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               An open-access web crawler that looks for content it identifies as "scholarly." Emphasis is on books and journal articles. Not always full text. Check our library's online catalog (see above) to see if Muhlenberg has access to the full text of a journal.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20129364">
              <a id="link_20129364" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=rih" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20129364,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music History I', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717593}); ">
               RILM Abstracts of Music Literature
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               ***RECOMMENDED***
               <br />
               Scholarly articles on many aspects of gender and music.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20129368">
              <a id="link_20129368" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20129368,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music History I', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12456990}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               World history database. Good for European history and culture back to 1492.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4642329" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17077447">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17077447">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17077447">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I cite sources in a bibliography?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17077447">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            Trexler Library's Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            Zotero
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17077447" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17077448">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17077448">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17077448">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17077448">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17077448" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>

      </a>
      or
      <a href="/content_mobile.php?pid=563165&amp;sid=4642329">
       mobile devices
      </a>
      .
     </div>
    </div>

    </div>
